data.detailed_description:
Ahoy, Me Hearties!
Are you ready for new adult adventures?

Furry Sex: Pirates - is an casual Battle Simulator with unique adult only scenes.
You need to win battle, and pass the level to open amazing arts and videos with our furry female-pirates.

Furry Sex: Pirates will put you deep into middle ages vibe with all pirate`s stuff: ships, corsets, swords and, of course, our incredible girls!

So, all hands on deck!

Features:

- Battle Simulator mechanics
- Pirates theme scenery
- 5 hot furry female-pirates characters
- Incredible adult only arts and videos
- levels with amazing battles


ALL CHARACTERS ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 HZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gigabyte PCI-ex GeForce GT 710
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity, sexual acts, imagery of sex scenes, animation of sex scenes, sound effects of sex scenes, 
All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
